chilanberry.desc: Blocks damage taken from a Normal-type attack. Single use.

enigmaberry.desc: Restores 100% max HP after holder is hit by a supereffective move. Single use.

lansatberry.desc: Holder gains +4 Critical Hit ratio when at 1/4 max HP or less. Single use.

leppaberry.desc: Restores the first of the holder's moves to reach 0 PP to maximum PP. Single use.

micleberry.desc: Holder's next move can't miss when at 1/4 max HP or less. Single use.

starfberry.desc: Raises a random stat by 12 when at 1/4 max HP or less (not acc/eva). Single use.

occaberry.desc: Blocks damage taken from a supereffective Fire-type attack. Single use.

passhoberry.desc: Blocks damage taken from a supereffective Water-type attack. Single use.

wacanberry.desc: Blocks damage taken from a supereffective Electric-type attack. Single use.

rindoberry.desc: Blocks damage taken from a supereffective Grass-type attack. Single use.

yacheberry.desc: Blocks damage taken from a supereffective Ice-type attack. Single use.

chopleberry.desc: Blocks damage taken from a supereffective Fighting-type attack. Single use.

kebiaberry.desc: Blocks damage taken from a supereffective Poison-type attack. Single use.

shucaberry.desc: Blocks damage taken from a supereffective Ground-type attack. Single use.

cobaberry.desc: Blocks damage taken from a supereffective Flying-type attack. Single use.

payapaberry.desc: Blocks damage taken from a supereffective Psychic-type attack. Single use.

tangaberry.desc: Blocks damage taken from a supereffective Bug-type attack. Single use.

chartiberry.desc: Blocks damage taken from a supereffective Rock-type attack. Single use.

kasibberry.desc: Blocks damage taken from a supereffective Ghost-type attack. Single use.

habanberry.desc: Blocks damage taken from a supereffective Dragon-type attack. Single use.

colburberry.desc: Blocks damage taken from a supereffective Dark-type attack. Single use.

babiriberry.desc: Blocks damage taken from a supereffective Steel-type attack. Single use.

roseliberry.desc: Blocks damage taken from a supereffective Fairy-type attack. Single use.

oranberry.desc: Restores 100% max HP when at 1/2 max HP or less. Single use.

sitrusberry.desc: Restores 100% max HP when at 1/2 max HP or less. Single use.

figyberry.desc: Restores 100% max HP at 1/4 max HP or less; confuses if -Atk Nature. Single use.

iapapaberry.desc: Restores 100% max HP at 1/4 max HP or less; confuses if -Def Nature. Single use.

wikiberry.desc: Restores 100% max HP at 1/4 max HP or less; confuses if -SpA Nature. Single use.

aguavberry.desc: Restores 100% max HP at 1/4 max HP or less; confuses if -SpD Nature. Single use.

magoberry.desc: Restores 100% max HP at 1/4 max HP or less; confuses if -Spe Nature. Single use.

liechiberry.desc: Raises holder's Attack by 12 stages when at 1/4 max HP or less. Single use.

ganlonberry.desc: Raises holder's Defense by 12 stages when at 1/4 max HP or less. Single use.

petayaberry.desc: Raises holder's Sp. Atk by 12 stages when at 1/4 max HP or less. Single use.

apicotberry.desc: Raises holder's Sp. Def by 12 stages when at 1/4 max HP or less. Single use.

salacberry.desc: Raises holder's Speed by 12 stages when at 1/4 max HP or less. Single use.

keeberry.desc: Raises holder's Defense by 12 stages after it is hit by a Physical attack. Single use.

marangaberry.desc: Raises holder's Sp. Def by 12 stages after it is hit by a Special attack. Single use.

jabocaberry.desc: If holder is hit by a physical move, attacker loses 100% of its HP. Single use.

rowapberry.desc: If holder is hit by a special move, attacker loses 100% of its HP. Single use.
